sentences.english: The idiots who decided agent orange was a good idea, should be hung.
sentences.chinese: 那些認爲使用橙劑是個好主意的人應該被吊死。

sentences.english: Why is the Vietnam veteran and concerned about Agent Orange?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼是越南老兵關注橙劑？

sentences.english: When and where Agent Orange used in Vietnam?
sentences.chinese: 何時，何地在越南橙劑使用？

sentences.english: “No evidence of Agent Orange has been found in Camp Carroll or in the adjacent community,” he said.
sentences.chinese: 證據顯示，在卡羅爾軍營或附近地區沒有發現橙劑。
